post.body: OMG I am sleepy 2day! That's messed up http://snipurl.com/93786
I am very happy to see you have a happiness score near mine. Let's rejoice! :) :) :)
Congrats on escaping!
going home to the cape--two weeks off! Enjoy work, sucka! http://snipurl.com/8r5cc
others like @bluesmoon have the same online check-in problem with it showing 0 bags #thisisbroken
Dear JetBlue, I chose 1 bag to check, and my boarding pass shows 0. Now I have to go to the counter tonight to change it :(
The Twitter Happiness score for awirtanen is: 520. http://happytweets.com
Teixeira to Yanks? Unbelievable.
Wow it's cold here... Guess I am used to NC
got my rental (Mazda6), I can fit in it fine, but wow it is painful to turn
Catching up on some "Secret Millionaire" on Hulu... a multi-millionaire named "G" uses a regular iPhone!
snow has started on the Cape!
wow, usps.com is all festive; i like it
Today is Free Shipping Day by the way: http://www.freeshippingday.com/
On the Cape, awake. Looks like a lot of snow this weekend potentially!
Almost home... Wow, not many tweeps on the Cape
The whale mural is now an iPod Nano chromatic ad. How tragic.
On the bus, listening to Dreams From My Father... http://snipurl.com/8r9mb
At baggage claim, ready for a late-night bus... I'll be in Barnstable at 1:10am http://snipurl.com/8r1rg
At RDU, and delayed... big surprise!
